lines.text: Gold would be your ruin, Captain. It would cost us our heads.
It's easier to live without a head than without gold, you numbskull!
I fight for hatred of the spanish! I fight for glory; not gold.
Man fights for what he lacks the most!
I fear we have no vanilla.
Holy poker! You son of a double-eyed whore from the reeking gutters of Rotterdam!
Confess your sins, my son, and receive forgiveness before the Almighty.
Well, Padre. I once had a mind to eat the Frog.
God placed the beasts upon the Earth for man's sustenance, my son. Come now; what else besides?
Beggin' your pardon, but that's the Frog standing alongside.
Well, now. That is another matter entirely...
Why was I born a Spaniard and not an Aztec? Why, Padre, are there never answers to the questions that truly matter? Why?
